citations.narrative:
The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) records for the research facility were not available for
review at the time of inspection. APHIS officials must have access to IACUC records in order to ensure compliance
with animal welfare laws and regulations.
Correct by February 9, 2018.
An exit briefing was conducted by phone with the facility representative.

narrative:
2.35(a)
RECORDKEEPING REQUIREMENTS.
The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) records for the research facility were not available for
review at the time of inspection.  APHIS officials must have access to IACUC records in order to ensure compliance
with animal welfare laws and regulations.
Correct by February 9, 2018.
An exit briefing was conducted by phone with the facility representative.
